description: Supporting Integrated Border Management Systems in the South Caucasus (SCIBM)

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
subproject.description:
Capacity of government institutions to manage boarders, migration, combat trafficking and effectively protect their rights enhanced.
Project title: Supporting Integrated Border Management Systems in the South Caucasus (SCIBM)
Project Output: Inter-agency, bilateral and regional co-operation enhanced between the SC countries, EUMS and other international stakeholders to facilitate the movement of persons and goods across borders while at the same time maintaining secure borders.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Integrated Border Management
